title: As AI disrupts industries, how prepared is your venture for the often unseen costs of regulatory compliance? Shockingly, 75% of AI startups encounter regulatory hurdles that can jeopardize their operations, according to the SEC. Ignoring compliance today could spell disaster tomorrow.

With the rollout of the EU's Artificial Intelligence Act, investors must consider: Are we truly ready for the ripple effects of tech regulation? As the spotlight shifts from macroeconomic uncertainties to the unpredictable landscape of AI compliance, neglecting this pivotal change can jeopardize your financial outlook.
